lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello and welcome to Critical Role, the game where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons. Tonight we have an interesting continuation of the story; we'll be picking up here shortly. First and foremost, we're going to get ourselves through a few announcements and some cool things you guys should know. So, first and foremost for returning fans and people watching the show, thank you, and if this your first time live or your first time seeing the show, hopefully you're not too confused and welcome as well. First and foremost, for those who haven't seen it yet we've been doing Spotify playlists for each of the players and the characters; we just finished that whole sequence with mine that went up today, so if you haven't had a chance to check it out you can go ahead and check it out. I did a playlist based around many of the NPCs in the world of Exandria that Vox Machina have come across and just a couple little tidbits about their characters and their backgrounds and one song per NPC that rounds out their personalities, so check it out if you're interested. Hopefully you like it and you also get an eye into my taste in music, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot of classic rock!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We had a new comic come up this week, didn't we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a new comic!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: New comic!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drink!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, based off of real events that happened in real life and in game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who won that drinking contest in real life?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was trying to remember.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Ashley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who lost that drinking contest, if I recall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lost so hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the pitchers is actually how you have to do it, so, but we just didn't post-- it's like the rules are for alcohol commercials. As long as you're not actually physically drinking it, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, Laura, you plop down drunkenly very adorably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other updates: my class update also went up yesterday and it was actually just updated before the show tonight with a couple of fixes to some of the text and stuff, so if you've already downloaded, go to the website and download the newest one, it's 1.2. It's called the Bloodhunter; it's a retool of the Witchhunter, taking it away from the promotional aspect that it was tied to back in October. I was able to retool it and make it something a little more wholly my own and my own unique design as opposed to being tied to the preexisting IP. So it's got some cool abilities. I hope you like it. If you feel like running it in your game or allowing your players to do so, have fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's got the seal of approval.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha! You wanted to talk about Super Power Beat Down real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, there was a new Super Power Beat Down that came out today where we are challenging Darth Maul versus Spider-man. Because, why not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because it's Christmas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Because it's Christmas?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why not. But you should check it out because we have a very fun cameo by someone who I don't want to spoil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) It's not me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's really not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's really not. But his name might rhyme with Pan Me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bahn mi, the Vietnamese sandwich that you can get in many places?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. It rhymes with bahn me. No, it doesn't, actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got Ang Lee to be in your short?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ang Lee!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's crazy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really lost right now. I'm genuinely lost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The chat room gets it, don't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pan Me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's major!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His name... yeah! There's a cameo in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He directed The Hulk! And The Ice Storm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The not-good one!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now that cameo's being edited out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. If the internet's been watching--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought it was funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If the internet's been paying attention, they'll know that I've practically already been in Brokeback Mountain II.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Speaking of which, you're in a thing this week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it, girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a happy ending.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "And I'm sorry."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another quick awesome announcement, this is huge: Ashley, can you please wear headphones, a slight echo is coming through?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you. So, if you guys could all help her do that, that would be great. Next week is our last episode before the holiday break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, don't even say that! We've already had that rumor go around apparently, like, "Oh my god, is the show going to end forever?" I'm like, no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As long as they'll let us do this, we're going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or as long as Matt doesn't kill us all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be returning on January 7th. But in the meantime, everyone will be enjoying time with their families and such. Enjoy your two week break off. I know we will. Also, once again just a reminder, we have our Critmas sweaters available.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm modeling one right now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also available in green.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would pay 50 dollars for a sweater like this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You look like you're snugly in there, I must say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got your poops right on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It keeps my poops nice and snug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poop through a cone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got two pockets for two poops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check out the Geek and Sundry website. They have all of the awesome stuff up there so you can get those last-minute presents for your friends and family who hopefully haven't seen the show so they're really confused what you get them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, like, "Dude! I got you something I like!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, hey, works out well. It's the season of the Homer bowling ball. Marisha, you want to talk about the Boonzy Arts candles?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yes, the Boonzy Arts candles. I meant to grab those. The D&D-related candles that I plugged back when we were doing the Slayer's Take episodes forever ago. They had a Kickstarter. They are out now and you can buy them on their website at BoonzyArts.com. Yes, and we have a set that we were going to be doing in a giveaway as well that she delivered that I'll find during break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you have it. Also as a reminder, we have Wyrmwood Gaming that does the really awesome high-quality gamer stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An excellent Christmas gift, or Critmas gift, a Wyrmwood Gaming box would be. If you use the code CritRole, you'll get free shipping. And they are lovely and fancy and they will make a nice, handsome Christmas present.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they will poop in your box for the delivery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to request that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was only you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam will do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will do that if you request.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Including the poo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, we can see the sparkle on your eyes is messing with the cameras. Can you also wear something over your eyes? So, headphones and also cover your eyes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No promises, you guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't have a comeback for that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Couple of last things. The Critter's Guide to Critmas is going up tomorrow, isn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tomorrow. At 6AM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 6AM.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to wake up for that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the Macy's Day Parade. No. But it'll be up that early. Now that we've had an awesome year of amazing Critmases, we've had a few ideas that the Critters actually gave us to focus the idea of Critmas a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The spirit of Critmas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what the holiday was always about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. We'll leave it at that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't do any better that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a Wii U game that just came out called Xenoblade Chronicles X where I voice a character named Lao, that just came out recently, so if you're a fan of those awesome RPGs, I will be really subdued and arrogant in your face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Subdued and arrogant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We get that for free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. Every week. Anything else, guys? We good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sound effect noises)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Of course. It's got to be, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lights swish. All right. So, to get you guys up to speed as fast as I can-- this is a really long arc. The Briarwoods, being a family that five years ago took over the city of Whitestone, where Percy hails from, murdered his family, and he barely escaped with his life, years later, came back into the folds of Vox Machina's existence, and it was decided to go ahead and hunt them down and save the city of Whitestone. Upon arriving, they began to stir rebellion in the town against this horrible undead menace controlled by Lady Briarwood herself. After this rebellion was incited, fires were burning, individuals were killed that were responsible for keeping the people down and just generally bad people all around were being slaughtered by our intrepid adventurers. They made their way into Whitestone Castle, where they had uncovered some information about the ziggurat, a project in which the Briarwoods had been developing something beneath the city of Whitestone, and discovered that Percy's sister Cassandra, who was thought to be dead long ago, actually still survived and was being kept in the castle. She joined the party as you guys fought your way down underneath the city of Whitestone through a series of tunnels, finding yourselves unintentionally locked within a trap, a retooled version of what was previously an acid distillery for the whitestone that's actually mined from the surrounding mountains, and thought left for dead by the Briarwoods themselves. In which Vax was charmed and taken along with them, and Cassandra showed herself--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were the one who got us into the acid in the first place. Thank you for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't think they would have done that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll never know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll never know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Acid sucks. I never want to encounter acid again. Every time we do, it's bad. It's always bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, acid's bad in general, you know, it's not like, "Oh, this acid's fine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Citric acid is pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pretty delicious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Preserves apples.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I stand corrected.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could it be a citric acid trap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's probably not going to happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Can we check for citric acid?" "You can certainly try." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not acid resistance on your armor, it's citric acid resistance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't get scurvy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, unconscious from the fall and also on the cusp of dying, the party rushed in to help her and realized seemingly the vicinity around this orb had cut all magic. So thus, they were snatched up and escorted off the side of the ziggurat, and that was where we left the last game. To pick up where we were, who had Vex in their arms last time? Was that you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you have Vex in your arms. Who has Delilah? And who has Cassandra?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog has both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has both of us. I'm piled on top of Delilah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, you have Delilah and and Vex. Who has Cassandra?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I have Cassandra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you guys are rushing down the steps of the ziggurat itself, the green glass-like jade material slowly fading into the whitestone as you rush towards the base with what little bit of light was available to you from the small bits of torches placed at the bottom of the ziggurat and what light sources you brought with you. You find yourselves at the very bottom of the dirt, looking around. There's the exit where you guys originally entered this chamber. You do also see a number of small metallic carts, some turned on their sides; you can see crumpled bits of whitestone and shards of that green glass residuum material left out. You can see there's piles of leftover building materials that are scattered about the floor of this area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you saying that Keyleth and I are caught up, at this point? Because I know that people started going out of the temple, Keyleth ran in, I handed Vex to Grog, I ran after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are still a little bit behind the rest of the group. You're on your way now, you're just now rushing down the stairs of the ziggurat while the rest of you have reached the bottom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She rolled that natural 20 that kept her from probably getting sucked into Uranus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. Probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Save versus Uranus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would have been bad. Save versus Uranus? Is that what you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is what I said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put it in the handbook.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like we're 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next errata document.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Lady Briarwood is manacled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's manacled behind you. And Cassandra is tied up. As the rest of you rush down to the bottom, minus Vax and Keyleth, do you wish to wait for them, or push on to the tunnel where you entered?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck them. We keep running. We're trying to get out of the area, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm barely conscious right now, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was yelling in the earpiece, fuck it, run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you know that they're following you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get this bitch off of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Yeah, fuck it. It's like carrying coats. Hold on. So I put one in each arm. There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we leaving?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're trying to get out of here as fast as we can. How are you feeling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Watch out for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So at this point, as you're having this discussion, you guys are rushing down, and you guys see this as you're rushing down the ziggurat, the radiant energy that is currently the form of Pike seems to have slowly dwindled and she looks over her shoulder with a look of immediate fear as it blinks out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Why the-- why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because of technology, and also the story.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I didn't even know she was gone!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't, either!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, no! No, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems as if whatever anti-magical aura has slowly pushed the divine connection that keeps her present from the current vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did your computer die?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, the battery died on the computer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's that black orb!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't know. Where can we plug it in at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys push on, making your way to the cavern and heading back towards the undercroft vicinity of Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Let me know when we leave that big-ass room that the ziggurat is in. We're still in it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have just now made your way towards the exit tunnel, so you're just now leaving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I remember the tunnels sucking booby-trap-wise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not until we're past the gold room. The glass room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I marked all the traps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All the traps are marked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the traps that we found.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, remember? There was one, the poison dust one which we're immune to still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But that already got set off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I check for traps as I go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Well, you push and make your way into--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're checking for traps?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're holding two ladies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys rush behind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Normal Saturday night, my friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head back into the tunnel having to lower your head a little bit as you're carrying this payload, you're lumbering through, giant goliath body just stomping through--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A payload? He called you a payload.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You come to where there is the partially-dissolved stone door, and you rush underneath and using all of your back muscle-- make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That's good. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) Tensing the entirety of your muscle structure--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not that heavy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's not about you being heavy. It's about the door itself not being quite large enough for him to come through carrying that large of people. You (grunts) lift it, and you hear the stone (scraping noise) shift as it's forcefully pushed up. You hear snaps of things breaking or supports that were keeping it in place as you, essentially, break the door and jam it upward, giving you enough space to pull through the rest of the party.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fucking hate doors. Don't we all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. Greatest nemesis of Vox Machina.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Cassandra awake or is she unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's unconscious now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way into the top level of the distillery room, down the pathway into the upward ramp to the opposite side, the door open, and you are now outside of the distillery trap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the danger area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, so who's at zero health?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm at one point of health.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have potions, now. We're out of the magic--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't you heal some people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can try a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have potions, too, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we out of the room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're out of the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're out of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're behind with Vax, trying to catch up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a common. Can I try giving Vex a common healing potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You want to stop for a second and pull it out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fucking drop Lady Briarwood on her face, hard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, she might die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, she could

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not even paying attention as to whether or not she's still breathing. You reach in your pouch and bring out your potion. Set Vex down and hand it to her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and heal 2d4 plus two hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Really?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Where's my d4? Plus two. Oh, that's good. That's a whole eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. That's actually a pretty good roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it stays? It works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, as you guys have pushed outside of that room, it appears to be functioning again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good. That took. Can you heal people? It's a yes or no question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm awake enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm awake enough. I wake up and I cast Cure Wounds on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it. Roll for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm like, "Ooh, I love me so much. Cure me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At 1st level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think 2nd level. I have enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever your wisdom modifier is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was not even as good as the common potion. Oh. Well, sort of. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still pretty low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, basically full hit points at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like we should heal you up just a touch more. What are you at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 23 points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's pretty fucking low.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll give you my greater heal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have one. She can have mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm a giant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'll take this one. I want you to have my greater healing potion. It would mean so much to me if you would take it, drink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem. If Pike were here, I'd give it to her, but...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understandable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's not, so. You're pretty cool, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Thanks, buddy. What do I roll for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. I feel so strong now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'd better roll strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11. So I'm at 34 points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, as a thank you for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about that gun?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just let me hold it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he did just give you a potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just letting you know, you're not skilled with ranged attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing he can do with it, anyway. I have all the ammunition.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what you think. My pickpocket fingers are faster than you could ever imagine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really don't think they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds like a challenge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Keyleth and Vax catch up to the rest of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did it go? Did you kill the little black thing of death?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slowly) No, I didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex gave Scanlan a gun. I don't think it's loaded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god. Be careful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it look cool?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to take care of that orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I tried to jam a piece of the magic glass. The jammy magic glass into it and-- I'm probably lucky that I was able to pull away as quickly as I did, because I think it eats everything around it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait, it's still there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still there, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it moving at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's doing its really fast spinny thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about all the bodies in the room? Are they still like, (moans)?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I could maybe go into my wildshape and bring down the building, I thought maybe if I collapsed the building, maybe it was drawing some sort of energy from the net of intertwined bodies, but I couldn't, because it was blocking all magic capabilities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look over at Lady Briarwood and do a check on her to see if she looks stable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Which, at this point, just a note, in all the chaos and all the intent, trying to get things out of there, you're just now starting to realize that the Seeming spell that you placed on the whole party has also been canceled as part of whatever this trigger anti-field was. So you all look around and realize, oh, we aren't a bunch of Percys and Cassandras.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm beautiful again!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, because I noticed your beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you checking on Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's nuzzling the body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep her unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, careful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and wake Cassandra up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Skype sounds)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You go ahead and check on her. Go ahead and make--actually this is pretty easy, you just go ahead and take a moment, you just feel her for a pulse. She is currently still alive. And with a flash of divine energy just past the outskirts of this anti-magic field, you can see Pike's radiant ethereal form all of a sudden reconstruct itself.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We were killing Lady Briarwood?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're okay. Everything's okay. Thank Sarenrae you're back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I heal somebody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did that a bit while you were gone, but yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm still pretty low! If you feel like it, I would take it and I would be grateful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How's everybody else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you heal a couple of people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a little shaky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a little shaky, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, heal us all. We love you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Let me do a Mass Cure Wounds. I have that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gather together, everyone, gather together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Group hug!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, but wait! Don't let Lady Briarwood in the circle of healing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is she alive? Did you check her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she's, thankfully from the blast and the sheer force of it, part of the wound was cauterized, but she has been bleeding quite a bit on the run down here, and she would probably need some sort of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I stabilize her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, wait, stabilize her first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should just kill her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to quickly check my gun. Is Lord Briarwood's name still on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and inspect the barrel. No. Sylas Briarwood is currently erased from the barrel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's hold off just a bit before we kill her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have some really dirty rags. Could I do a medicine check and try and stabilize her bleeding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dirty rags?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have medicine skills?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zero!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, as you guys are having this conversation, Grog comes over and pulls out a mottled mass of really filthy rags from the Bag of Holding, probably used in various nose-wiping circumstances.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or other things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But somehow it manages to stop the bleeding and keep her relatively stable for the moment, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, and then I take her by the foot and I drag her on her face away from the group. Very gently, but still by her foot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Double-check. Perhaps gag her, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right, yeah, she talks that shit, doesn't she?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't want her speaking, and she only has one arm, so magic's going to be tricky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can't do this kind of thing, but she can still talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, did you say you wanted to cast Mass Cure Wounds, you said?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can choose up to six creatures in a 30-foot radius, so it's your choice who you want to heal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can't see us. Why are we holding our hands up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, I have you guys on my iPad down here, but you're delayed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's six including all of us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'll cure all the six people in my family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's 3d8 plus five for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pour one out for your homies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll high!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, to have a cleric in the group again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, right? Shit! Life!

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: She's rolling.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Let this be a lesson to all the people out there who think clerics are lame and nobody loves them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We love them! Can I tear a piece of fabric off of one of the three remaining fancy robes and I tie it around Lady Briarwood's mouth? But like-- (muffled) in, and you know like (muffled) in the teeth all-- she can't really enunciate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you pull it and you gag her around the side of her mouth and as you end up tying it, you see one of her eyes lulls open and she kind of, (coughs, sputters).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelps) Shit, she's awake!

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Punch her in the face!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No wait, don't. You'll kill her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you. What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blindfold her!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I slap her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Roll a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to kill her with a slap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She'll be knocked unconscious and she'll have to save three times again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh that's good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're curious, she's still alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can tell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She almost killed me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she just unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still breathing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and wake up Cassandra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did bandages on her real good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Percy?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will have a discussion later. In the meantime, do you know what that thing in there is and how do we stop it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't... what? What's going on?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The spinning orb of death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She starts moving around, looking around the tunnel real fast at everyone. "What happened? "What's going on?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You betrayed some bitches, that's what you did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you say this, you see she reacts as almost someone had just punched her in the chest and the tears begin to flow down her face again, and she, "I'm sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to slap her in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (slap) Go ahead and roll a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's your sister, Percy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She might be unconscious too!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not with my strength!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16. Well, actually my strength is still thin because I still have a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Negative two strength, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, yeah okay. You smack her to get her attention in this circumstance. She stops for a second and gathers herself. Her breathing slows and she stares off into space for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need my sister back. Are you awake? Are you a terrible person? Do I want to strangle you right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good. Then we can work with this. They were building something down here. The Briarwoods are no longer a problem. They were building something-- what do you know about it? It maybe started, it seems to be affecting magic. I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. They wouldn't let me near it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't lie to us anymore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not lying! Do I have a reason to lie right now?" And she looks over at you with an intensity to her gaze that catches you not as desperation, but as passionate self-loathing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. I know." She leans her head down on the side of this cavern wall and stares off into space. "All that I know about this is that they've been building it under the guidance of some other "person or entity. They referred to him many times as the Whispered One. They're very secretive about "it. The only reason I knew was because I overheard a few conversations and questioned them about it. To "which there was punishment. But they mainly kept me to try and keep the people at bay. My job was "to keep in contact with anyone who would attempt to rise against them, and inform them. I would "prevent any surprises, although apparently (chuckles) and thankfully, I didn't do a very good job." And she looks around the room at the rest of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I check my history memory banks to see if I know anything about the Whispered One or if that jogs any memory?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a religion check, Mr. Bard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Religion check? Well, that's not good. 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! Natural 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it! I had a really strong reaction to that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, the whispers!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's whispering about the Whispered One!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's gone! Where is he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the pre-show days!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not new, it's just been a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's been a long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he's on this side of the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: None of us have rolled this well in so long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We used to play-- don't over-listen to it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (starts singing In the Hall of the Mountain King)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He is licking the inside of Sam's ear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at his eyes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matthew is the Whispered One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is the Whispered One! This is normally the time when Sam would--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Whispered One! I have a memory! I don't know where I learned of this knowledge-- I am very old-- but I did, at some point in my travels, I remember reading about something. A lich king?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lich entity, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I remember, he tried to achieve great power, and I don't know if he was successful or not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cassandra, does any of that sound familiar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just knew they were very close with this individual."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you betrayed us, you said you were serving a higher purpose. Did they plan to sacrifice you to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She blinks her eyes, and she says, "I don't feel like I was right in my head. I look back on so "many decisions I've made, and all the people that I've--" The tears just start flowing again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check. (rolls) I'll take that. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Best that you can read off her is there is a deep look of regret and sorrow in her face. And you do notice that, through most of this conversation, as much as she's been able to talk to all of you, she has been unable to make eye contact with Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whitestone needs to be tended to and protected. Do you know anything that can help us save your birthright here and now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, you've already done half the job." Her eyes look over at the unconscious Delilah in the hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cassandra, is there any reason why they'd want to sacrifice you in particular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She thinks hard for a second, her eyes squinting. "I don't. They spoke very little-- "intentionally, I think-- of what they wanted to do. To be honest, I think there was an element "that even they didn't know quite what they were doing. I was a tool. I was to be used. I had my "purposes. I did my best to fulfill them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got a question. Do you care if I smash the shit out of Lady Briarwood's head now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thoom) The gun itself seems warmer and warmer, and you guys all notice as a bit of smoke begins to billow out the sides of Percy's sleeves. You hear a familiar voice creep up in the back of your head. "Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk up to Lady Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here at your mercy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put my gun to Lady Briarwood's head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, Percy, you're going to shoot an unarmed woman?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hush!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't shoot an unarmed woman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unarmed? She tried to kill us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You changed the deal. Take her name off the gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The deal was never changed."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's he talking to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The deal was made."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull the gun away. Things have changed. We need to talk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's he talking to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hold up my hand and shush the group with my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You made a great sacrifice for my gifts, Percival. Do not let it be in vain."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing feels better, nothing is avenged. What is this worth to you? And I put the gun back at her head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pull the trigger."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out my hammer...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pull it back, put it to her, put it back. "Maybe I will."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're placing the gun against your own head?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And back to hers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival, don't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Percy, no!" "Percival, don't do this. We made a deal."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put the gun to the side-- no, I'm holding the gun on Briarwood. That deal was a soft deal. It was a dream. It was a vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What are visions if not a window into the future? You understand so little, Percival. Do not "make me regret sharing this with you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Besides. I put the gun to the hand of Lady Briarwood and pull the trigger. The gun's broken anyway. I drop it. I'm not satisfied. I want my money back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) The smoke still billows out from you at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's actually also still around her, it occurs to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (mumbles) You have advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have advantage! Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not doing anything, but I'm holding a dagger and just watching Percy, and aiming at Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay! 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. You feel that warm pulse that was in your hand earlier that was coming from the gun? It pulses like a heartbeat in the hand that was holding it, and for a second you feel like something grabbed your wrist and slapped it away towards your back, reaching for where Bad News is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which does work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you (grunts) rip control of your hand once again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whether or not it is a merciful, quick death or a slow and agonizing one, controlled by something darker than I know, is entirely up to you. How do we stop that thing?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah, whose eyes are still rolling after all the shouting that's been going on as she comes into consciousness with a gag around her mouth and goes (breathes heavily, struggling) And her eyes dart around in fear. You can see that her makeup has run down her cheeks from her own lamenting over Sylas's loss and the confusion over the ritual. And the fear all of a sudden turns to seething, burning hatred as they dart around. And then (struggles again). She can't talk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will Mage Hand to remove the gag from her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god! I pull an arrow and aim it right at her head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I prep my fire hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know the pain you're feeling right now. I know the rage. I know every moment of it, and I guarantee I can make it worse. I can make it so much worse. Fix this. And join your beloved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, the gag falls away from her mouth from the magic hand. She's glancing at you and the smoke is now billowing up stronger to the point where you can barely see Percy's torso. You can see his head now, and what little bit of a view you have, his eyes have gone completely dark. There is just pitch black, completely encasing the entirety of his visible eye. You can see his feet still dangling beneath the smoke, and his feet are digging and tensed into the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Delilah, don't make me hurt you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach over and I grab Vex's hand. And I look at her and I say, what do we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, be ready to restrain me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm ready!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival Frederickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III, you will fight this monster inside of you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Delilah is looking at you right now and the anger and fury in her eyes clarified, she just looks up and, "You've already taken everything from me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really haven't. You still have your sanity and your life. I will take your life tonight, but I can leave you your sanity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Interesting. You seem to be struggling, Percy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine. Casting Minor Illusion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm changing my form into the screaming, writhing, slowly-melting visage of Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm just going to scream in holy high hell and pain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Suck it, girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Minor Illusion, as a limitation, it wouldn't be a full-body illusion, but you can take elements of your features.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in smoke. I'm just taking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Where once Percy's face existed, it twists into this shimmering apparition of Sylas Briarwood looking down at her as his face contorts into horrible, screaming pain. The head rises up and almost soundlessly, he screams out as the flesh begins to melt from the bone. As it does, Percy's voice rings out in this cacophonous roar that shakes the cavern around you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That pain you're feeling, I've felt for years. Don't think I've imagined every way to hurt you! I could spend years hurting you before you die, in ways you cannot imagine. Now, how do we stop it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was too soon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why? Why was it too soon? What were you waiting for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I still owe him for what he gave me. For what "he gave us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did he give you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, her eyes well up with tears, and she looks over. "He gave me my Sylas back. And "you took him from me again. So do what you must do. I know I've paid my penance, and I know that "no matter what steps you take now, it will only drag you deeper into this dark hole you've drawn "yourselves. And you will hear me laughing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I really won't. Knock her out again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Fine! (punching sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? (impact noise) You hear (clinking) across some of the lower rocks as two of her teeth go scattering out the side of her mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Collect them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not pointy, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check her person for anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I will gladly do that for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on a second. Are you sure you don't want to smoke this bitch?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I check her person for anything valuable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't feel...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the plan here, Percy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I pick up the Pepperbox off the floor to give it to him, and I try to sneak out a bullet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're different bullets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus two! Plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So five. (giggles)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The three, in theory, is actually low enough to break it further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus two, it's five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope. That's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you watch as Scanlan looks around, grabs it. Picks it up and (clink) the full barrel comes off of the gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I back away from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, he's got smoke billowing out of him right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kick it off away to the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan. Give me the other gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's on the floor right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The other gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were talking to something out there. What was it? I was very scared. I'm a little man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just change the subject.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who were you talking to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need another gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to kill me with it? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk between them and say, Percy, what are we doing here? That woman deserves everything that is brought upon her, but what are we doing for Whitestone? What are we doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: More importantly, what was that just now?! Who were you talking to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things have gotten a bit weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, you cannot honestly tell us you don't know anymore! We just watched you have a full-fledged conversation with yourself!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did they not hear any of the voice?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, was he talking out loud?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit, I came off like a crazy person just then!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did! Yes, you did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's what I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were trying to answer you for a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's what I know. Vecna is possibly, maybe on the loose, maybe coming back. We know that this ritual has been started, and we don't know whether killing her is going to end it or not. So I propose that we start leaving right away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, do you know anything about Vecna?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you go ahead and make a religion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's tempting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just text her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, okay. Not a whole lot more information than what Scanlan was able to ascertain from this. You just know that this entity known as Vecna, once a very powerful arch-lich, had once attempted to ascend to godhood, and was supposedly halted in the process, a battle that occurred on another plane, amongst heroes that only a few came back from, but apparently stopped a very terrible thing. But that was hundreds and hundreds of years ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder what Erevan has to do with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he created a vampire? He made Sylas a vampire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know that-- sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know, and Pike relays this too. In particular, Vecna is known as, for lack of a better term, the patron saint-- or lesser god to those who worship-- as the deity of secrets. Dark secrets, things that wish to be kept out of the knowledge of most of the world at large. And these secrets are coveted.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jeez.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things are complex, and I don't trust myself to take her life. I'm in over my head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need someone else to do it for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if that will help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She almost killed Vex, she didn't kill Vax, we've got to do fucking something with her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This thing wants her dead, and the only thing I can think to do is to say no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing? What thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This thing in my head--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your thing?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What thing is that, Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, start fucking talking, Percival, because we've all watched you talk to yourself for five straight minutes, and we're not going to deal with it for much longer!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Percy. I'm with Vax, here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a dream, and that was all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mentioned just now that you wanted your money back. Was this a dream? Did you pay somebody? And with what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a dream where I was offered a means to revenge. It was a dream!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, clearly it wasn't!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I know that now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is as new to me as anyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It feels like you are lying to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check on him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) "Let me know if I'm lying, because--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do you all keep rolling so poorly against me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, tell me what your persuasion and deception skills are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Persuasion six, deception two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 23! Ooh! Two in one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a whisper?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inter-party insight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to title this "Whispers!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whispers!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we've already had an episode called "Whispers."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, this one's called "Secrets and Lies!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one's called "Whisper-Sync."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Ear-tonguing."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This one's called just (whisper noises).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the record, I like the shadow stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (squeals) I get one, too!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like there was more tongue with you, though, Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Way to point that out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't get sufficient tongue in yours?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't seem very satisfied.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, these shirts are available online at geekandsundry.com!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew you were going to do that. I almost did it when he was whispering in your ear, just for your sake!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would also like you to make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) Shut the fuck up!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Breaking the game!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the-- what?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you guys watch the smoke momentarily drift from his form behind him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Behind him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Off of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't need to yell at us, Percy. We're just trying to help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The smoke dissipates or goes behind him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think he's rational.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm aiming at the smoke and just watching and waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you can see this smoke that was once billowing from Percy is now standing in this outer human-like shape.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unbeam-say!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cashed out-say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it stands there for a moment, it begins to swell and grow larger, filling almost the height of the ten-foot tunnel that you guys are standing in, looming over Percy's body, still connected through his shadow through the floor of the tunnel itself. It just looms over and as it peeks forward, you guys for the first time hear the voice that's been poking through him this entire time just say, "Percival. Do it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shoot a holy arrow at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're fighting the thing that's been in your head!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Therapy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's so many allegories!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Therapy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're fighting the demons in your head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's pretty great, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My therapist would be so proud right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, we're out of like everything, aren't we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we're great, we're fine, we're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got a guy with a hammer. We're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez, okay. Well, I've still got two 3rd-level spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need stats on Lord Briarwood's sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't taken a short rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what we have? We have fucking Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have Pike!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we do! We've got Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm pretty low on spells, guys, but we're going to be okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have been dreading this for years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What? What have you been dreading?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This moment right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, this has been in him for three years, four years.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Forever! Since the beginning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since you've met me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been standing in front of Lady Briarwood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So right there with her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm either going to be a new Percy or a new person entirely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't say that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry. It's so fun to torture you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As everyone's drawing their weapons, I shout, maybe we should check and make sure it won't kill him if we kill it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's too late. I shot an arrow at it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too late. Who's standing where? I'm going to say Pike's probably--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a little cavern for this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy is currently right here. Well, more in the center there talking to everybody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a mini for the dark specter of my soul? I love you! I love you so much!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Cassandra on the ground there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm next to Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you guys would be probably back here. Your daggers ready. Trinket is probably over by you, of course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, of course he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Keyleth? I'd say you're probably on this side, talking to Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, but we were holding hands at one point, so we would be close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Grog was covering me, so Grog would've been closer to me, because I had him--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was in front of Lady Briarwood, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have you right here between him and Lady Briarwood. Right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That seems good, we're good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have a clear shot, not that I'm going to do it, but I was aiming at Percy, so I would have a clear line of sight. Is there nothing between us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have a clear line of sight. The two gnomes are between you, so you're fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so happy right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did my holy arrow do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, first and foremost, initiative order. We have 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow, okay, so we have Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two 20s. 19 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't suck it up this game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Oh, 17, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sorry, did I miss that section?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. That's okay. Pike, what did you get?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight! Yeah! All right. First and foremost, Vex, you're up with the initiative on this. You go ahead and you bring your holy arrow and you release it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a surprise attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and make your attacks with your arrows, if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! 28 and 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of those hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome. Okay. These two... balls. So 15, 16, 17, plus holy damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll consider that, do 1d4 radiant damage to it. In addition to that, so 17 plus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 plus four is 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 for the first one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then ten for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I Hunter's Mark him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't say I Hunter's Marked him at the beginning-- I'm explaining this to you guys, because I'd already said I shot at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I was being honest. I'm looking at the chat room, because I know they're going to tell me I forgot my damn Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. All right. You pull back and release the first arrow. As it goes and hits, you can see the smoke itself is obscuring its place and keeping it hard to hit, but you still strike true, the arrow striking into its form. And there's a flash of radiant energy as it hits, and you see the creature takes from the impact and stares down at its chest. As it looks up, its face turning towards you, and it is this formless humanoid body, but the face itself does pinch into this elongated crow skull--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I didn't do holy damage for the second one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the arrows hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Plus two more for the holy damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They impacted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They impacted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to move you or Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket moves around and in front of me to protect me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There you go. That's it, you're just going to keep there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn. Scanlan, you're up next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How tall is the tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 12 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. No? Okay. Precious little I can do. I will Lightning Bolt it. Ooh, I'm right next to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, which means you could blast towards the wall and hit it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will turn around and I will, I will Lightning Bolt it, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. So you, it's right there in front of you as the smoke rises up, and you see the arrows strike it, there's the flash of holy energy from Vex's attack, and that moment, as it's distracted, you use that to conjure a lightning bolt and (lightning sound). For a moment, the flashing of light lights up the cavern around. The bolt passes through it harmlessly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What did you, what was that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lightning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Either or magic. One of the two didn't affect it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lightning bolt passes through it and it strikes the back of the wall and you can see the electrical energy discharge across the stone and earth, arcing and spidering off until it dissipates, seeming to not have any sort of impact or effect on the billowing smoke entity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to stay there or you want to move? You are in its melee range. You are in its melee range, so if you move it will get an attack of opportunity if it chooses to take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stammers) I will not move and instead I will inspire Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, take your d10. This moment of intensity, as you turn around now at this point, seeing everyone striking, you've looked your head over and you can see for the first time in full physical form, the creature that has haunted your dreams for the past five years. While it is not present, you can feel it smile. It's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run over to my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And cut open her bonds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you pull out the-- okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take out my sword and cut open her bonds. Get back! Run! And then, if I still have enough timing beyond that, I'd love to take a swipe at it with my sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it's going to, to free her entirely of her bonds and give her that, it's going to be your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. We haven't had a short rest, have we?

lines.name: MATT, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not looking good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It is now Vax's turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh? Good. So I've got advantage because the smoke demon hasn't gone yet, so dagger and a dagger. First one is, that's 29, and the second one is a 24, so 29 and 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's giving you advantage on this? Because he hasn't gone first in the first round? That is correct, yes. All right. So both of those hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The first one is eight and the second one is eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keen dagger, life-stealing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Do you want to sneak attack with this? Because in theory, it's in melee range with an ally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, with Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Percy and with Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, boss! Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't rob yourself of what you do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt's understanding that we are all screwed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven, eight, nine. It's hard to see over there. 15 points of sneak attack damage. Yeah, I'm not used to the screen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're working on it. All right, cool. 15 points of sneak attack damage. So as you throw the two daggers, plunging them both, both of them, their little aura of magical energy flashing as they both impact the smoke form, seeming to sink slowly as they hit and then finding the edge of their blades sunken into its torso. As it rears back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight and eight and 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So the daggers did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. That, are you going to stay where you are, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't make Orthax regret working with you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Orthax?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Orthax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hired them to get rid of some termites in my house, once.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well that was really your mistake, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shifting this way twice. Percy, you will get an attack of opportunity with your rapier if you'd like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're using Briarwood's rapier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I haven't. No short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage. All right. Good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, on the rest of its turn. As it shifts up, it doesn't walk or move, its form drifts along and the shadows meet it there, the smoke almost appears at the spot where it intends to go and then it meets it in that moment. As it does, it now stands between a bunch of you. Its eyes flare with dark purple, and you just hear this scream, this screeching (scream) echo out from it, and as it does, all of you hold your ears for a second. I need everyone to make a wisdom saving throw. You have advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have advantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With the ten, 23.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20. On the first roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 for Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. All of you guys hold your ears for a second, and everyone that rolled higher than a 17 takes six points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Psychic damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You guys both take 13 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 13 because he's evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you feel all of a sudden like your brain fill with this urge to strike something, this overwhelming need to slash out at whatever's near you. Both of you get a brief move. Grog, that's going to pull you this way, and Vax, it's going to pull you this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right at each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need both of you guys to roll an attack roll. As you rush up with your hammer, flames, and you swing it down towards Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't dap me for hitting Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Cutting Words to try to dodge out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to say, you gonna fail that attack, so you better sit your ass on back, because I ain't no hollaback gnome, I ain't no hollaback gnome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll a d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d10. Three? So that, what does that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Cutting Words, if I recall--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It lowers his attack by three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you resist with the hammer, giving him just enough time to step out of the way, and it slams into the ground harmlessly, cracking the stone at the base.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "You know what? You're right! He is no hollaback gnome."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, I'd like you to go ahead and make a dagger strike against Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled a 13. Pike, you look over your shoulder as all of a sudden Vax appears behind you and slams forward with the dagger. You whip around with your shield and, with a large striking arc of sparks deflect the blade blow across the dark air of this interior tunnel, harmlessly. You take no damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Badass Pike!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She also ain't no hollaback gnome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ain't no hollaback gnome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ain't no hollaback gnome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ain't no hollaback gnome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you know what? It's going to go ahead and do this. The entity then moves backwards. Pike and Scanlan-- oh, you already used your reaction to do Cutting Words, so you don't get that. Pike, go ahead and make a melee attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it. That's a reaction?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do I roll for that, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One reaction per round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your d20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll a d20, roll for your normal mace attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it steps backward into the wall and out of visual range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the wall. It just vanishes into the side of the tunnel. That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The cloud went in the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And move in front of the rest of the group. I put my back to the rest of the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so like right there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck, Grog, you just tried to kill me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't remember that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, you can hold. You can use your action to ready an attack so whenever a trigger of your choosing happens, you can then make your attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What trigger would you like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When he reappears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and comes within melee range?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, when I can see him with my beautiful eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Not trusting this guy, I'm going to go ahead and cast Faerie Fire. It's a 20-foot radius. Just right in this bubble that we've been hanging out in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I'm assuming he's going to be up in our faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Faerie Fire. Where do you want it? Just in this vicinity?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just right, right around us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Are you going to move or you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll step back a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Step out of the Faerie Fire or into it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Step out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Am I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just ten feet? Okay. Ending your turn, Keyleth. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Is Guiding Bolt considered the same thing that Lightning Bolt would be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, as far as you know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's radiant damage and, let me pull up the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't see him right now, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have no visual on him. The smoke entity has moved into the wall and is nowhere in your visible range right now, so you have nothing that you can attack in theory that you know of.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
