lines.text: If you have any buff spells, anything you want to do in preparation for it, or hold your action as well until it reappears, you can do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'll hold my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you staying put? Are you moving at all, or do you want to stay where you are?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'll stay. I can't see where I'm at, but I think I'll just stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we surround him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you shout that out at the end of that? Cassandra, now, who has been unbound, gets up. Her weapons were taken from her when you bound her, so she stands up and puts herself to the wall and looks at you with a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand her my sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She takes the rapier and looks at it and goes running away, back towards where Castle Whitestone is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She runs?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, instead of holding your action, cast something, you can do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to go up to Percy and cast Protection from Evil on him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to choose? You get to choose a certain type of creature which he's protected against.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we know anything about Orthax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea. You saw it briefly. I'm going to have you roll a religion check. Being a religiously trained individual, let's see if you can ascertain the nature of this creature, this entity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not this powerful. Either this is just a powerful entity of a similar type, or it's been feeding over time, or it's something beyond that, but you get the sense that this thing is demonic in nature, based on the brief appearance you had with it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'd like to protect him from shadow demons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that would be fiends. So you choose fiends? Great. So any attack rolls against you from fiend creatures have disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a demon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's thinking he might be, based on her roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have favored enemy as demons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then, knowing that going forward, that may change your next round of combat. Good to know! So you are currently are protected from fiends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If only that were true in real life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. So demons are my favored enemy, so I have advantage against recalling information about them. Can I recall anything about something that looks like this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Orthax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check. Just roll a d20 and add your intelligence. And you have advantage on it because he's your favored.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not that smart. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay. You know that these creatures are incorporeal. They can generally shift in and out of solid matter as a way of moving and defending itself. You know that they're difficult to fight in the dark. You also know that they, because of their form, are generally resistant to a lot of types of elemental-type damage. And lighting and cold: no effect whatsoever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as poison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as much as you can ascertain with that roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. All right, then I'm going to cast-- where is he? (shouting) He's in the fucking wall!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just hit the whole wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark. Can I sense anything about where he is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can actually sense him. He's maybe ten feet inside the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he's hiding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently hiding in the wall, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then for my bonus action, I'm going to hide, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't roll it. The cape had nothing to do with your rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three and a three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, hold on, let me add my stealth to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 33.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. So you (wind noise) flatten yourself against the wall, best of your ability.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do pretty much nothing. And I'm going to hold my turn until he appears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to hold your action until he appears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How dark is it in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than the torches you guys have been carrying through here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the glowing off of our bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. I'm glowing. No wonder I rolled so poorly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glowing from the Faerie Fire. But it's a gentle glow, so it's very low light in this area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like inside of Groot gentle glow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like we have body glitter on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's like a nice basement bar. A good dive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get this shit off me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Ending your turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say to Keyleth, get this shit off me. I don't want it to see me. Please. And then I will walk to the other side of Percy. We don't see the thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's only a 20-foot radius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but isn't it on me now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's a radius. If you move out of it, you're not in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I walk out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You step out of the area and it all drifts off your body, and you're no longer affected by the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't see the thing, right? Yeah. There's not much we can do without seeing our enemy, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not currently, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just hold my turn? Is that a thing? Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can say to Grog, Grog? You're sure you want to-- are you okay? You're good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ends your turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back out of the Faerie Fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just stepping out of it there. You can keep going if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go a little further back behind Scanlan. And I'm going to pull out Bad News and hold my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ending your turn. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to practice an old trick that my sister and I have done, where I hide behind Trinket's gigantic bear ass and hold my turn and aim at the spot that my sister is aiming at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ditto.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At that moment, as you vanish to the side, the entity pops out from this side--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right behind him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right behind you as you're preparing. And all of a sudden (whoosh) smoke billows out. You turn out of the corner of your head. At that point, everyone who was holding your action, you're doing your attacks simultaneously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he's in that Faerie Fire, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, currently, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you get advantage, yo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He didn't see it being cast. He withdrew before it happened, so he steps right into it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, starting with Bad News with a sharpshooter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We get advantage on attacking him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all of your attacks on him currently have advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god, because I rolled a one. 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 unfortunately misses. You fire and (ricochet noise) it seems that, in a strange way, the gentle pink dust is actually obscuring your vision with the dark shadow in that vicinity and it blasts a piece of rock off the side of the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Firing again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So fire, reload.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better! 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 does hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's... That's pizza! I'm looking for my dice. I didn't think this through. 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, good to know. This is piercing, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The blast hits, but it appears that the expected impact from the blast of Bad News-- a bit of smoke dissipates its impact and it seems to not be as damaging as you expected it to be. All right, that brings us to the next person who was holding their action. I believe Scanlan, you were? What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Through the Hand Cone, I will say, don't you know smoking is the number one cause of cancer and emphysema and will shorten your life by an estimated ten to 20 years? It's not cool, and you shouldn't do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that all true?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm BS-ing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It does not make its saving throw; it rolled a four, so it takes 3d4 psychic damage. Go ahead and roll that. And it has disadvantage on its next attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That fiend has low self-esteem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage, boom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it has disadvantage on what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On its next attack roll. Its eyes go darker purple for a second, like it can't contemplate the fact that it just got insulted mid-battle, and then they flare up again, even more furious. As part of that, it's going to use its reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It turns towards you and in-- what languages do you speak?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mutters in foreign language) And for a second, you feel your field of vision close down like it's focused entirely on you. You're currently marked by its Mark of Vengeance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So, essentially, there's an effect that's intent on you at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a charm effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your held actions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a fear effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I just saw him mutter in Scanlan's ear as I take both of my blades and I'm just going to slash both of them across and he's surrounded, so this is a sneak attack, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With advantage. The first one...

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: (groan)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is 16. Oh no! And the second one is a 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to strike the first time, and as you swing outward, you catch smoke and it dissipates around the blade and you stab into the side of the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack (impact noise).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes that sneak attack damage. That's four plus six is ten plus... sneak attack, motherfucker! Ten, 16, 21, 22, 26, 28, 29 total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was 38.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: 29 total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) My math is awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This blade, however: as you stab into this cloud of smoke, you feel there is more physical presence to where it was and it sinks in and you feel this reverberation as it reacts to the pain. This dull (hoarse growl) growl sound.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shout, hands off the gnome! as I do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On my roll, do I still get a bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used it last turn. That was his reaction to you holding your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but do I get my bonus action as part of my move, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you hold your action, you just get the action when it triggers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that ends Vax. Do you want to do anything else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Oh, I'm right up against it? I'm going to use disengage and back up further back by my sister. Is that Vex and Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move between my two favorite ladies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there you go. Good to know. And you were holding your action?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you were holding your action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So everyone make your attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Here's my question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I want to be honest and I don't remember if I said I dipped arrows in the second holy oil flask or if I put them on Trinket's claws. Do we remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did all arrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, I'll roll for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With advantage!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With advantage, which is good. I'm going to switch things. New ones. (gasps) What just happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's 14 and eight. 14 plus your attack. The second roll, she got a one and a two, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?! So one was a 25. And then 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean 19. 19 and a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the 19 from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was the first roll. And the second--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you rolled a one and a two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that was the second roll. The first was an eight and a 14, plus her modifiers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. See, I was rolling-- I understand. I was rolling it in my head differently, but we'll count it as that. I was counting it as that was my first attempts at my first two attacks and my second attempts at my first two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't work that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, okay, that's fine. So, 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so one of them hit. All right, so you go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez, we've got a smoke demon, don'tcha know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 plus five is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage. So one of them flies forward and misses--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Nearly grazes the top of your head, just vanishing. You don't notice because you're currently (growls) right in his face. Second one manages to strike it and splinter inside of its torso, and you can see a flash of energy from the impact and it (squawking groan, growl) surveys the area around it. The smoke around it gets even more intense, and you can see it flaring up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm still against the wall, glowing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the smoke gets even thicker and obscures it even further.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably light up this area as much as possible, FYI.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to light it up with my flaming war hammer. I turn and I swing at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So metal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, that's good. 28?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits. Second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Oh, is it still covered in the holy oil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, so an extra 1d4 radiant damage on each strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the radiant, fiery damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Burning, holy wrath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. All righty. (impact sounds) Both hammer blows strike it, battering the smoke around, and you can see as this hammer swings through its body, the smoke almost swallows the light and for a second, it's almost like this dull orb of darkness beneath the surface of a deep lake. And then as the hammer emerges from its body, the light flares up again. It's almost like it's swallowing the light as you strike it. But it seems to be taking the impacts pretty hard. All right, that ends your turn. Now, Orthax can take his turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so let's see.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, do I get my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, you were holding, too. Yeah, you can do it, too. Thank you for reminding me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Guiding Bolt it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, so 4d6--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level of Guiding Bolt are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say one more time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level of Guiding Bolt are you casting?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do it at 4th because I have a couple of 4th-level left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that will be... (chuckles) Roll to attack first. You have advantage on the attack roll because it's currently inside Faerie Fire, so take the higher of the two rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would just like to say that Pike is very eerie, yet beautiful in this iridescent glow of astral projection. It's hard to hear her sometimes, but god damn it, she makes it look good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So at 4th level, that would be 7d6 radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what did you cast?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot of d6.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Times two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it times two after that because it's a crit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a crit? Oh, right, because that's-- well, it's straight dice rolls. Or does she roll dice twice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just confirming one thing real fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She has just blinded us all in holy light is what I'm assuming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so go ahead and do your math.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little holy nuke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was it, Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Times two?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Times two, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so that would be times two. Just confirming. It has been a while since we've had any sort of spell-based crit. So that would be 42 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY, MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemingly featureless across its body other than its black, obsidian torso. No legs. They disappear into the smoke beneath it. Its head has the long, hooked, birdlike skull beak, and where the eyes are, it's just this smooth, almost leathery texture across the dark body itself. You can see what looks like faint horns that curve around the back, that curl upward. And as it takes the impact, its head rolls back and you can hear this billowing scream: (moaning cry) As it leans back forward towards you, it looks like it's having a rough moment. Now we get to its turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It farts a little cloud of smoke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of us are outside the Faerie Fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on that, it zeroes down on the little ball of radiant energy staring before it that just blasted a hole in its form. It's going to take all three of its strikes at you, Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got disadvantage on its attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And has advantage because she's in Faerie Fire, so it cancels it to a natural attack. That is 21. What's your AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, so that hits. 27. And a natural one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was like 19... one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so... That would be 14 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. No, I'm sorry, because of the roll there-- that's 14 plus an additional 12, so that's 16 for the first strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quietly) 12? That's 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, it was 12 on top of the original amount, which I said was 16?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 and then 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 and 12, yeah, so it was 26 psychic damage you took on the first strike and the second one was seven, too. 21.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought the second one failed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third one. It has three attacks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, there's three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so what was the total, sorry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be 26 and 21, so yeah, 47 points of psychic damage as its arm reaches out towards you and strikes. Also, I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And with beauty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grace. Dignity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Skype.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing your Hunter's Mark damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. Yeah, you feel as its claws move through your body, elements of its shadow essence reach up and try to grasp an element of your willpower. You shrug it off. The might of Sarenrae is too strong and it has no way of grasping your intent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, get out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you're back up to your turn now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunts) I want to hit it again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have advantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Faerie Fire. That's better. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second one is... 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just barely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First one is 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay. You hit the side of its body and you can see now, small cracks in its black form are starting to form and you can see a bit of that purplish energy leaking out. It's starting to actually visibly show a difficulty in keeping its corporeal form. As both blows slam into it, you can see it shaking, and there is a struggle to its movement. Do you want to stay where you are, or do you want to move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's totally surrounded, pretty much, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm actually going to throw up-- I'm going to maintain my Faerie Fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to throw up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to-- yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: (retching noises) (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (dry-heaving noises) It's purple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hold her hair back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I say, (slurred) I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's okay. It's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) How tall is the ceiling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 12 feet, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take a Daylight beam and go (bing) right over top of it like a nice pretty spotlight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Which, that is a concentration spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not, actually. It's an action that lasts for an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting! I would assume that was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I looked it up just now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This little spark ball of daylight opens up on the ceiling like a bright spotlight that fills the area. As it does, you can see the creature (howling groan) shrinks away from it, and its smoke actually dissipates, lowering its armor class again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a good move!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Are you going to stay where you are, or are you going to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take another step back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. With that... Okay. There's a momentary whisper in the shadow around you. And the sound of chains. I want everyone to make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So all of you continue focusing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, whispers! Whispers and whispers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The whispers are back! It's like we're back in Casa de WillingBlam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whispers are so exciting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I really did miss the whispers. I hadn't even realized how much I missed them until today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, Matt is whispering in Taliesin's ear, just so you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sweet nothings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck. Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's licking his ear a lot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's giving him a wet willie?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike, you're up. What's your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Okay. I'm going to Guiding Bolt it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Same deal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't tell you yet. It's not my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your single attack roll right now because the previous thing is--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, so this time, it's ready for you and it dodges out of the way. The blast hits the stone wall behind it and cracks it slightly. Do you want to move or stay where you are?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll move away from it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will get an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, hold on a minute. I should probably take a potion or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you low?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm pretty low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I could have done something about that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nope. It's okay. I'm going to take a-- what do I have in here? It just says I have a healing potion. God, I don't know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be the lowest. That's 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you get healed from your own healing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I don't have enough-- I don't think I have enough left. I want to save them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Two. Six. Okay, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you heal eight and did you want to move back or stay where you are?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra keeps running off this way and halts for a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, who's that? Who's going? Oh, that's Cassandra? We're okay with her running away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's running away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sent her running away. Top is Vex. You're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Who all's around him? Pike and Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike and Grog and technically Trinket, as well, are all in melee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then I'm going to shoot a couple of arrows at him again, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't do anything. But he's still advantage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's advantage against him, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These will be your last holy arrows because you've used six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm out of holy arrows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because one of them was my exploding arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so these are just regular.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's... 21 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shitballs. Well, there you go. Goodbye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. 42 points of damage this round. These arrows now find their way towards the cracks that are starting to appear in its chest and as each one strikes in, these arrows are actually visibly staying in its body. What was once this amorphous smoke, after the impacts from Grog and as it begins to wear itself down, it's starting to find it harder and harder to keep this ethereal form, so now these arrows are sticking out of these cracks of purplish, glowing energy and it's moving a little more sluggishly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hide again for my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a stealth check. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan's up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21 stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have my wits about me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just feel like there's an aspect-- you get the sense you probably don't want to be close to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the Scanlan I know and love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have so little that I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly there's a stained-glass wall behind it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, in-joke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As my bonus action, I will-- as my movement, I (sighs) tragically, flip the gun to Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's two pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the one that I gave him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the good gun. In the-- what's that Martin Lawrence movie? Bad Boys. They did it all in slow motion. Just throw the gun. Okay. As a bonus action, I will Healing Word Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she heal herself okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she didn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will Healing Word her, and I'll sing, believe it or not, you're made mostly of air. I never thought you could feel so free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what level are you using Healing Word at?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just at one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level one? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d4 plus five. Lame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d4 plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight. Eight, honey. I love you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: "Thanks!" I blow him a smoke kiss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I love it. And then for my move, my action, my whatever you call it... I've got fucking nothing, man! I say to the beast, to the whatever it is, I say, and another thing! Your smoking encourages minors to smoke and creates an aura that makes going to restaurants not pleasant and it's just horrible. It makes your clothes stink. It's terrible. So another Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Please. Please be enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please let this be what kills him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wouldn't that be the third time this has happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll damage. 3d4 psychic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight. All right. You can see now, it turns to you for a second and the Mark of Vengeance fades as suddenly you feel like you've damaged it mentally enough to the point where it doesn't even want to deal with you anymore. You're far too mean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) You're too mean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to stay where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I yell, Delilah's getting away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all glance over. The shackles that are on the ground are now collapsed and empty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the gag safely removed from her mouth during this allowed her to cast Misty Step, which is a verbal-based spell. She is currently--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm calculating that right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And can I see her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to have to ask you to roll a perception check here in a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the question is-- yeah, I'm curious how far she got.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't bind her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because we're morons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, she got out of her manacles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She Misty Stepped, so she turned into air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not quite sure where she is or how far she's gotten, but you know she's down that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Cassandra!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cassandra's right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Cassandra doesn't notice. She's just been running because you told her to run. She did hear you shout and she looked over her shoulder, but not in time for her to see anything happen, because this all happened during the last round, during your realization. You guys look around and Delilah's gone. You're the only one who really saw the direction she's going, but it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch, we left her alive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cannot believe we left her alive!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure it'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm fucking pissed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe she's learned the error of her ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck! Ugh. Okay, I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chase her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell us where she is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to double my speed. I'm going to burn my turn double-speeding, trying to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to catch up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to catch up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then as I pass my sister, I yell, she went this way. She's invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I hear that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She went this way! She's invisible!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hear it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We hear it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's Percy's turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry, everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the situation, make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You've got to do what you've got to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You do not have advantage on this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm adding my bonus die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Okay. You see a couple of the recent footsteps, but you don't see them freshly being made, so you know she's not too far yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to follow that path of footsteps. I'm keeping an eye on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to use my bonus action to dash and run 60 feet after Percy to catch up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? You're not going to kill the smoke beast?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to kill the smoke beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your bonus dash, your movement to get there, so you move up 60.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's 60 feet from where I was? Okay, and I'm going to throw a dagger after-- well, can I do a perception check and that, or is that two different things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Honestly, once the creature's invisible and you don't know where it was, you don't even get a chance to check at this distance, so it's just attacking at disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to attack at disadvantage, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 is a miss. (whoosh) It returns to your belt. Finds no purchase.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it was an 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was an 18. He rolled 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was an 18?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Seven plus 11 is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven plus 11 is indeed 18. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks. Thanks, sis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No problem. This is why I look over your shoulder even when my math is bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that is eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But she was almost unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there, face down on the ground, is Delilah, sprawled out, face down in the dirt with a single dagger sticking out of the center of her back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then it's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then it disappears. And blood begins to pour out from the wound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's dead. You killed her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is she dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to go and inspect. Now it is Orthax's turn. Orthax is going to move here, still remain in melee, and is going to use a secondary rampage pulse, since it recharges. Gives out another desperate scream (raspy roar) outwards in the vicinity. 20-foot radius. I need Keyleth, Vex, Trinket, Pike, and Grog to all make wisdom saving throws with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take a 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 25 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 25 total.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. 19 for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Vex, Keyleth, and Pike, you guys all take five points of psychic damage as you cover your ears momentarily. Grog and Trinket both take ten points of psychic damage. Both turn immediately, flanking Pike, who has been the radiant blaster across this entity. I need you to make an attack and I need Trinket to make an attack against Pike. You guys both have advantage because she's in the Faerie Fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! Three and a four. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trinket rolled a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Pike. This blast comes out ringing in your ears and as your vision comes back to you and you look up, all you see is Grog lifting this giant hammer with his eyes clouded in the same black smoke material. You bring up your shield and as the hammer comes down, striking at you, you know there's a bruise going to be on your forearm tomorrow because the sheer force of it hits you, but at the same time, you know it's not the friend you grew up with. And you look up into his face as the cloud fades and you can see an expression of immediate regret on his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? What did I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want a bite attack or a claw attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to have to probably go bite on this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll the dice and then that times two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 11 points of piercing damage as all of a sudden, Trinket sinks his jaws into the back of your shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Times two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, times two. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll on the dice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the dice? So 22, plus whatever the modifier is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's eight plus the modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Okay. 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 16 plus whatever the modifier is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I rolled four. Times two is eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus the modifier of seven.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Is 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Thank you so much for clarification. 15 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Math, everybody!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Trinket clenches down. You feel the armor plates jamming together and it wrenches your shoulder out of the socket. Not enough to actually do too much serious damage. And immediately Trinket pulls away and you hear this whine behind you, this (sad moaning). His nose rubs against your head.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I put my hand out and touch his nose and tell him it's okay.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orthax is going to turn and begin to chase after Percy now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, I know. Grog and Pike and Trinket all get attacks of opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20. First roll. Don't even need to do it again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nat 20s all up in this bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does not hit, unfortunately. So Pike, you swing, but, still in pain from Trinket's attack and Grog coming at you, you swing wide and it passes through the space behind it. Grog, remember to roll with an additional d12, too, because of your brutal critical.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kill him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 for Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 for Trinket. Awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muttering) 20, 21, 22. (louder) 31 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 total. How do you and Trinket want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, did you kill him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to pick up the hammer and slam him down to the ground just so he's at Trinket's head height.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then right when he gets to his height, Trinket reaches up and bites him as hard as he can and lashes him around like dog with a toy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, as you're stopping and looking over, you look down just in time for the shadow to (whoosh) reach your legs, and you feel this cold rise up your body and then slowly dissipate into this little nugget of cold in the center of your chest, and then vanish.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, but doesn't he have protection?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about the protection?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He disappears. It disappeared. Maybe it disappeared forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe it's always going to be there, haunting us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While he's thinking, I walk up to Delilah, grab her by the clothes, drag her to the side of the wall and prop her up, and turn to Percy. And say, end this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cassandra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The moment of tension passes and Cassandra's still holding her there, her head down, her hair in front of her face, just shaking, keeping her pinned against the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put my hand on her shoulder and gently pull her back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rapier withdraws and the body tumbles to the ground. She looks back at you, face just a mess. "Thank you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a lot to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do." And she hands the rapier back to you, and she grabs the scruff of Delilah's collar and begins dragging her up the hallway towards the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I meant to loot her earlier and it didn't happen. Sorry, I just really like that part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hurry. If there's one thing I've learned here in "Whitestone, it's that things do not stay dead long."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seeing as I'm 50 feet ahead of my sister, I walk ahead of her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you fucking do this to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she wearing a cloak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. Inspecting the body, you find a very fine pair of metallic bracers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) For archery purposes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm like five feet away from you, at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her robe, though soaked with blood, is very, very well-made.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I roll that up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you roll up the robe. Her cloak is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's what I meant. The cloak. I leave the robe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, take everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Take everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. All the fabric. I take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take all the fabric. The robe and the cloak. So mark those down. The cloak itself looked like cloth at a distance. Close up, you can see it's actually a very fine dark black/purple fur, and down at the side of it, you see dangling these two long tentacles that end in these little cupping spiked elements. It looks like it was carved from a creature at one point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the cloak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check to see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I think I know what it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get up in time to smack him upside the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've actually fought these creatures before. This is a displacer beast. It's a Cloak of Displacement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got the cloak and I walk away from it and leave my sister to go sick on the rest of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's naked. Good job, brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she's mostly nude, other than her undergarments.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I toss the robe back on her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax, Cassandra, let's take her to the acid pits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only thing she has left is a ring on her finger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about those bracers you were talking about?
